Parameters: MediaPlayer: the MediaPlayer associated with this callback
int: the width of the video
int: the height of the video
onVideoSizeChanged(android.media.MediaPl.Description: Called to indicate the video size The video size (width and height) could be 0 if there was no video, no display surface was set, or the value was not determined yet.
onVideoSizeChanged(android.media.MediaPl.FullName: public abstract void onVideoSizeChanged (MediaPlayer mp, int width, int height)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when the video size is first known or updated
